c.  “I have also said that anyone who doesn’t feel sure whether we are talk-
ing about a second human life should surely give life the benefit of the
doubt. If you don’t know whether a body is alive or dead, you would
never bury it. I think this consideration itself should be enough for all of
us to insist on protecting the unborn” (21).
